title: Data Files
text:
Adding New Files

Drop files into data/ (avoid spaces; prefer .bed, .gff3, .tsv, .csv).
Commit & push.
Re-render the site locally (or via CI once configured).

Optional metadata sidecar: create <filename>.yml with e.g.:
description: High-confidence gene models.
organism: Example species
source: Ensembl v110
Descriptions appear in the table if provided.

title: MOSAiC
text:
Welcome to the MOSAiC resource portal.
This repository now serves complementary purposes of direct data delivery and an user-friendly JBrowse genome browser.

title: MOSAiC
text:
JBrowse
Open the genome browser directly: Open JBrowse.
Embedded view below:

title: MOSAiC
text:
Data Files
See the Data Files page for an automatically generated listing of resources placed in the data/ directory.

title: MOSAiC Genome Resources
text:
Contributing Data
Place additional tab-delimited files (e.g. BED, GFF3, TSV, CSV) into the top-level data/ directory. Re-render this site (instructions in the root README.md) to update the listing.

title: MOSAiC Genome Resources
text:
Build
You need the Quarto CLI installed locally.
quarto --version
quarto render quarto/
Preview with live reload:
quarto preview quarto/

title: MOSAiC Genome Resources
text:
Future Ideas

GitHub Action to auto-render on push.
Track configuration linking directly to files in data/.
Simple search across annotation files.

Issues and PRs welcome.

title: Data Files
text:
Gene Count Matrix

Download Apul Gene Counts (CSV)
